File: National Unity party head Benny Gantz gives a statement. (Video screenshot)

Benny Gantz, the leader of the opposition National Unity party, pledges support for the security and emergency forces and says Israel is ‚Äúcompletely unified.‚Äù

‚ÄúI want to say clearly, in a way that resonates from Gaza, via Beirut, to Tehran: The entire people of Israel are united,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúAll Israel‚Äôs citizens stand behind the security forces, and the government has the backing to charge a heavy, painful and effective price in order that an event like this is not repeated.‚Äù

‚ÄúThere is no coalition and opposition now,‚Äù Gantz adds, ‚Äújust a single fist that will pound the enemy.‚Äù

He says all those involved in this attack are destined to die, and that any other terror groups that decide to take part ‚Äúwill be making a terrible mistake.‚Äù

‚ÄúIt must be honestly said: the results of this attack are grave. Soon, some of the rumors will be confirmed as bad and painful news for us all. I send my condolences to the families of the fallen‚Ä¶ and pray for the recovery of all the injured.‚Äù

He hails the bravery of civilians, the emergency services and soldiers. ‚ÄúIsrael can be taken by surprise, but it cannot be beaten, as we will prove this time as well,‚Äù Gantz says.

[5:12 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/blinken-washington-unequivocally-condemns-appalling-attacks-by-hamas-terrorists/)

#### [Blinken: Washington ‚Äòunequivocally condemns‚Äô appalling attacks by Hamas terrorists](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/blinken-washington-unequivocally-condemns-appalling-attacks-by-hamas-terrorists/)

By [Jacob Magid](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/jacob-magid/ "Jacob Magid")

US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken says Washington ‚Äúunequivocally condemns the appalling attacks by Hamas terrorists against Israel, including civilians and civilian communities.‚Äù

‚ÄúThere is never any justification for terrorism. We stand in solidarity with the government and people of Israel, and extend our condolences for the Israeli lives lost in these attacks.‚Äù

‚ÄúWe will remain in close contact with our Israeli partners. The United States supports Israel‚Äôs right to defend itself,‚Äù Blinken says in a statement.

[5:09 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/biden-calls-netanyahu-says-us-stands-by-israel-pm-warns-of-prolonged-powerful-campaign-to-win/)

#### [Biden calls Netanyahu, says US stands by Israel; PM warns of ‚Äòprolonged, powerful campaign‚Äô to win](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/biden-calls-netanyahu-says-us-stands-by-israel-pm-warns-of-prolonged-powerful-campaign-to-win/)

US President Joe Biden called Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and stressed that the US stands by Israel and fully supports Israel‚Äôs right to defend itself, the Israeli premier‚Äôs office says.

Netanyahu thanked Biden for his support and told him that a ‚Äúprolonged and powerful campaign would be required in which Israel would win,‚Äù the Israeli readout says.

[5:06 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/macron-says-france-stands-by-israel-and-israelis-in-ongoing-massive-attack-from-hamas/)

‚ÄúFrance stands by Israel and Israelis, supports their security and their right to defend themselves.‚Äù

#### [Trump: Hamas assault on Israel a ‚Äòdisgrace,‚Äô US taxpayer dollars ‚Äòhelped fund these attacks‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/trump-hamas-assault-on-israel-a-disgrace-us-taxpayer-dollars-helped-fund-these-attacks/)

By [Jacob Magid](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/jacob-magid/ "Jacob Magid")

Former US president Donald Trump weighs in on the ongoing Hamas attack on Israel, calling them a ‚Äúdisgrace‚Äù and asserting that Israel ‚Äúhas every right to defend itself with overwhelming force.‚Äù

‚ÄúSadly, American taxpayer dollars helped fund these attacks, which many reports are saying came from the Biden Administration,‚Äù he says, ostensibly blaming US policy on Iran for today‚Äôs attacks.

‚ÄúWe brought so much peace to the Middle East through the Abraham Accords, only to see Biden whittle it away at a far more rapid pace than anyone thought possible. Here we go again,‚Äù Trump says in a statement.

[5:00 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/white-house-says-biden-briefed-on-hamas-assault-on-southern-israel/)

#### [White House says Biden briefed on Hamas assault on southern Israel](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/white-house-says-biden-briefed-on-hamas-assault-on-southern-israel/)

The White House says US President Joe Biden has been briefed by senior national security officials regarding the ongoing Hamas aerial and ground assault on towns in southern and central Israel.

‚ÄúThe president will continue to receive updates and White House officials remain in close contact with Israeli partners,‚Äù the White House Press Office says in a statement.

[5:00 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-says-dozens-of-palestinian-terrorists-killed-in-attempt-to-infiltrate-into-israel-this-morning/)

#### [IDF says dozens of Palestinian terrorists killed in attempt to infiltrate from the sea this morning](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-says-dozens-of-palestinian-terrorists-killed-in-attempt-to-infiltrate-into-israel-this-morning/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

The Israeli Navy killed dozens of Palestinian terrorists who attempted to infiltrate into Israel this morning, the military says.

‚ÄúForces conducted a naval pursuit and targeted dozens of terrorists after they attempted to infiltrate into Israeli territory,‚Äù the Israel Defense Forces says in a statement, publishing a video of the incident.

‚ÄúThe soldiers opened fire toward the terrorists and thwarted dozens of them, as well as two rubber boats and two additional vessels,‚Äù the IDF adds.

> This morning the Israeli Navy killed a number of Hamas terrorists who attempted to infiltrate into Israel, the military says. [pic.twitter.com/VafBR80OVA](https://t.co/VafBR80OVA)

> ‚Äî Emanuel (Mannie) Fabian (@manniefabian) [October 7, 2023](https://twitter.com/manniefabian/status/1710655221162971634?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

[4:57 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/9-hamas-terrorists-killed-in-the-southern-town-of-nirim-near-gaza/)

#### [9 Hamas terrorists killed in the southern town of Nirim, near Gaza](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/9-hamas-terrorists-killed-in-the-southern-town-of-nirim-near-gaza/)

Israeli troops killed nine Hamas terrorists in the southern town of Nirim, close to the border with the Gaza Strip, Army Radio reports.

The Israel Defense Forces has been fighting Palestinian gunmen in Israeli territory since early this morning.

[4:55 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-900-wounded-in-massive-hamas-attack-on-israel/)

#### [At least 900 wounded in massive Hamas attack on Israel](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-900-wounded-in-massive-hamas-attack-on-israel/)

The Health Ministry says so far 908 injured people have been taken to hospitals for treatment in the ongoing terror attack by Hamas on southern and central Israel.

At least 100 have been killed in the unprecedented assault, authorities say.

[4:50 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/over-100-killed-in-hamas-onslaught-on-southern-israel/)

#### [Over 100 killed in Hamas onslaught on southern Israel; toll expected to rise](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/over-100-killed-in-hamas-onslaught-on-southern-israel/)

[![An Israeli soldier stands by the bodies of people killed by Palestinian terrorists who entered from the Gaza Strip, in the southern Israeli city of Sderot, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/ Tsafrir Abayov)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/AP23280378742461-640x400.jpg "An Israeli soldier stands by the bodies of people killed by Palestinian terrorists who entered from the Gaza Strip, in the southern Israeli city of Sderot, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/ Tsafrir Abayov)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/over-100-killed-in-hamas-onslaught-on-southern-israel/)

An Israeli soldier stands by the bodies of people killed by Palestinian terrorists who entered from the Gaza Strip, in the southern Israeli city of Sderot, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/ Tsafrir Abayov)

The death toll from the Hamas terror group‚Äôs attack on Israel rises to more than 100, Hebrew-language media cite medical officials as saying.

The number is seen as certain to rise further.

Some 800 people have been wounded in the attacks, which have included hundreds of Hamas terrorists infiltrating into Israel and gunning down soldiers and civilians. Others were wounded in rocket attacks.

[4:44 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-claims-to-have-captured-many-israeli-captives-including-senior-officers/)

#### [Hamas claims to have captured many Israeli captives, ‚Äòincluding senior officers‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-claims-to-have-captured-many-israeli-captives-including-senior-officers/)

Hamas deputy chief Saleh al-Arouri tells Al Jazeera that the group has captured ‚Äúa big number‚Äù of Israelis. He says ‚Äúsenior officers‚Äù are among them.

These claims have not been confirmed or verified by Israel.

[4:31 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-run-ministry-in-gaza-says-198-palestinians-killed-since-start-of-terror-groups-assault/)

#### [Hamas-run ministry in Gaza says 198 Palestinians killed since start of terror group‚Äôs assault](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-run-ministry-in-gaza-says-198-palestinians-killed-since-start-of-terror-groups-assault/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

The Hamas-run health ministry in the Gaza Strip says 198 Palestinians have been killed and another 1,610 have been wounded since the start of the escalation this morning.

[4:30 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/rocket-fire-continues-toward-south-as-idf-focuses-on-hamas-terrorists-in-israeli-territory/)

#### [Rocket fire continues toward south as IDF focuses on Hamas terrorists in Israeli territory](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/rocket-fire-continues-toward-south-as-idf-focuses-on-hamas-terrorists-in-israeli-territory/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

[![Smoke billows in Ashkelon on October 7, 2023, as barrages of rockets were fired from the Palestinian enclave into Israeli territory (AHMAD GHARABLI / AFP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/33XN2TC-highres-640x400.jpg "Smoke billows in Ashkelon on October 7, 2023, as barrages of rockets were fired from the Palestinian enclave into Israeli territory (AHMAD GHARABLI / AFP)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/rocket-fire-continues-toward-south-as-idf-focuses-on-hamas-terrorists-in-israeli-territory/)

Smoke billows in Ashkelon on October 7, 2023, as barrages of rockets were fired from the Palestinian enclave into Israeli territory (AHMAD GHARABLI / AFP)

Sporadic rocket fire continues against towns close to the border with the Gaza Strip.

The rate of rocket fire from Gaza appears to have slowed in the last hour, with sirens sounding in several communities.

The Israeli military is still focusing on fighting Hamas terrorists still in Israeli territory.

[4:22 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/raam-leader-abbas-urges-arab-community-not-to-respond-to-incitement-calls-for-unity/)

#### [Ra‚Äôam leader Abbas urges Arab community not to respond to incitement, calls for unity](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/raam-leader-abbas-urges-arab-community-not-to-respond-to-incitement-calls-for-unity/)

By [Gianluca Pacchiani](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/gianluca-pacchiani/ "Gianluca Pacchiani")

[![Ra'am party head MK Mansour Abbas leads a faction meeting, at the Knesset in Jerusalem, on June 12, 2023. (Yonatan Sindel/Flash90)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/07/F230612YS125-1-640x400.jpg "Ra'am party head MK Mansour Abbas leads a faction meeting, at the Knesset in Jerusalem, on June 12, 2023. (Yonatan Sindel/Flash90)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/raam-leader-abbas-urges-arab-community-not-to-respond-to-incitement-calls-for-unity/)

Ra'am party head MK Mansour Abbas leads a faction meeting, at the Knesset in Jerusalem, on June 12, 2023. (Yonatan Sindel/Flash90)

Ra‚Äôam‚Äôs Mansour Abbas urges Arab Israelis not to respond to rumors or incitement

Abbas, leader of the Islamist Ra‚Äôam party, is the first Arab Israeli political leader to publish a statement reacting to the ongoing deadly Hamas assault on Israel.

The party leader writes in Hebrew: ‚ÄúIn light of the sad, tragic events since this morning, and the situation assessments saying that the situation may devolve into a regional war, I call on Arab citizens of Israel and on all citizens, Arabs and Jews alike, to exert restraint and behave responsibly and patiently, to obey the law and maintain public order.‚Äù

‚ÄúI urge \[Arab Israeli citizens\] to restrain from any type of violence or damage to public or private property, and not respond to rumors or incitement aimed at causing an escalation inside or outside Arab towns, or in mixed cities.‚Äù

Abbas further calls for unity and mutual support and to give hospitality to families fleeing the areas under attack, particularly in the Negev and in unrecognized villages, many of which are not equipped with anti-rocket shelters.

[4:16 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/kibbutz-beeri-resident-reports-lots-of-gunfire-amid-unconfirmed-reports-of-hostages/)

#### [Kibbutz Be‚Äôeri resident hears ‚Äòlots of gunfire‚Äô amid unconfirmed reports of hostages held there](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/kibbutz-beeri-resident-reports-lots-of-gunfire-amid-unconfirmed-reports-of-hostages/)

Ella, a resident of Kibbutz Be‚Äôeri, tells Channel 12 that she is in a safe room at her home in the kibbutz and is hearing ‚Äúlots of gunfire‚Äù nearby.

She speaks amid unconfirmed reports that Hamas gunmen are holding hostages at the kibbutz dining hall.

Meanwhile, another resident of the south says his wife and daughters have disappeared, and that he has traced his wife‚Äôs phone ‚Äî which doesn‚Äôt answer ‚Äî to Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip. He says he fears his family has been kidnapped to Gaza.

Hamas claims to have kidnapped dozens of Israeli civilians and soldiers to Gaza.

These reports are not officially confirmed by Israel. Channel 12 news reports, however, that Hamas has kidnapped men and women, young and old, civilians and soldiers to the Gaza Strip. The infiltration is proving ‚Äúfar more successful‚Äù from Hamas‚Äôs perspective than it would have expected, the TV station‚Äôs Ohad Hemo says, and Hamas almost certainly doesn‚Äôt know itself how many Israelis it has kidnapped.

In turn, though, Hemo says, the Israeli response in Gaza is likely to be much more far-reaching than Hamas would have expected.

[4:13 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/iranian-officials-praise-hamas-attack-on-israel-a-proud-operation/)

#### [Iranian officials praise Hamas attack on Israel: ‚ÄòA proud operation‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/iranian-officials-praise-hamas-attack-on-israel-a-proud-operation/)

By [AFP](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/afp/ "AFP")
 and [ToI Staff](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/times-of-israel-staff/ "ToI Staff")

[![Gazans celebrate by a destroyed Israeli tank at the broken Israel-Gaza border fence, east of Khan Younis, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Yousef Masoud)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/AP23280400744514-640x400.jpg "Gazans celebrate by a destroyed Israeli tank at the broken Israel-Gaza border fence, east of Khan Younis, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Yousef Masoud)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/iranian-officials-praise-hamas-attack-on-israel-a-proud-operation/)

Gazans celebrate by a destroyed Israeli tank at the broken Israel-Gaza border fence, east of Khan Younis, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Yousef Masoud)

A senior adviser to Iran‚Äôs supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei expresses support for an attack Hamas launched against Israel, calling it a ‚Äúproud operation.‚Äù

‚ÄúWe support the proud operation of Al-Aqsa Flood,‚Äù Yahya Rahim Safavi says at a meeting held in support of Palestinian children in Tehran, quoted by ISNA news agency.

‚ÄúWe support this operation, and we are sure that the resistance front also supports this issue,‚Äù says Safavi, who is a senior general in the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps.

Safavi expressed backing for the Palestinian terrorists ‚Äúuntil the liberation of Palestine and Jerusalem.‚Äù

Iran‚Äôs foreign ministry spokesman Nasser Kanani also hailed the Palestinian terror assault on Israel.

‚ÄúToday‚Äôs operation marked a new page in the field of resistance and armed operations against the occupiers,‚Äù he says.

‚ÄúThe resistance has so far achieved brilliant victories during this operation, and this is a bright spot in the history of the Palestinian people‚Äôs struggle against the Zionists.‚Äù

At a parliament session on Saturday, Iranian lawmakers chanted ‚ÄúDown with Israel,‚Äù ‚ÄúDown with America,‚Äù and ‚ÄúWelcome Palestine,‚Äù according to a video published by Tasnim news agency.

Iran, which hosted leaders of Hamas and Islamic Jihad in June, considers Israel its arch-enemy.

[4:08 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/a-number-of-airlines-cancel-flights-to-israel-amid-widespread-hamas-attack/)

#### [A number of airlines cancel flights to Israel amid widespread Hamas attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/a-number-of-airlines-cancel-flights-to-israel-amid-widespread-hamas-attack/)

By [AFP](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/afp/ "AFP")
 and [ToI Staff](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/times-of-israel-staff/ "ToI Staff")

German airline Lufthansa is cutting flights to Israel following a wave of Palestinian attacks, a spokesman tells AFP.

‚ÄúGiven the current security situation in Tel Aviv,‚Äù Lufthansa will maintain a single flight to Frankfurt but ‚Äúall other Lufthansa flights to and from Tel Aviv have been canceled for this Saturday.‚Äù

The Walla news site says Swiss Air, Austrian Airlines and Turkish Airlines are among the companies to cancel flights to and from Israel.

‚ÄúOur commitment to Israel‚Äôs right to defend itself remains unwavering, and I extend my condolences to the families of those who lost their lives in this abhorrent attack on civilians,‚Äù Austin says in a statement.

Over nine hours since the Hamas terror group launched a deadly assault on Israel with terrorists infiltrating from land, air and sea, there are still gunmen in a number of Israeli communities.

In addition, there is still near-continuous rocket fire ‚Äî while the center of the country was targeted by projectiles earlier in the day, the fire is now mainly toward southern towns.

#### [Saudi Arabia calls for ‚Äòhalt to escalation between the two sides‚Äô amid deadly Hamas assault](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/saudi-arabia-calls-for-halt-to-escalation-between-the-two-sides-amid-deadly-hamas-assault/)

Saudi Arabia calls for an ‚Äúimmediate halt to the escalation between the two sides, the protection of civilians, and restraint‚Äù amid the ongoing assault by the Hamas terror group.

Riyadh says it ‚Äòrepeatedly warned‚Äô of an explosive situation with Palestinians.

In a statement, the Kingdom recalls its ‚Äúrepeated warnings of the danger of the explosion of the situation, as a result of the continued occupation, the deprivation of the Palestinian people of their legitimate rights, and the repetition of systematic provocations against its sanctities.‚Äù

The Saudi Foreign Ministry further calls on the international community to lead a ‚Äúcredible peace process‚Äù to achieve a two-state solution.

The kingdom has been conducting negotiations to achieve a normalization deal with Israel. According to recent leaks, the Saudi negotiators, while insisting on concessions for the Palestinians, do not see the creation of a Palestinian state as a precondition for a possible deal.

[3:40 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/netanyahu-and-biden-expected-to-speak-in-the-next-hour/)

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and US President Joe Biden are expected to speak in the next hour amid a massive and deadly attack by the Hamas terror group on Israel.

Dozens have been killed and hundreds wounded as terrorists infiltrated from Gaza into Israeli towns, and thousands of rockets were launched at the south and center of the country.

[3:34 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/herzog-calls-on-internaional-community-to-stand-with-israel-after-hamas-attack/)

#### [Herzog calls on international community to stand with Israel after Hamas attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/herzog-calls-on-internaional-community-to-stand-with-israel-after-hamas-attack/)

[![President Isaac Herzog speaks during a ceremony at the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange on July 17, 2023. (Avshalom Sassoni/ Flash90)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/09/F230717AVS08-640x400.jpg "President Isaac Herzog speaks during a ceremony at the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange on July 17, 2023. (Avshalom Sassoni/ Flash90)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/herzog-calls-on-internaional-community-to-stand-with-israel-after-hamas-attack/)

President Isaac Herzog speaks during a ceremony at the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange on July 17, 2023. (Avshalom Sassoni/ Flash90)

President Isaac Herzog calls for the international community to unite in its condemnation of Hamas after the Gaza-based terror group launched a deadly attack.

‚ÄúToday we saw the true face of Hamas. A terrorist army whose only goal is the cold-blooded murder of innocent men, women, and children. Supported and directed by their proxy commanders in Iran, they carried out an unprovoked, heinous attack against the Jewish state on a Jewish holy day. Innocent civilians were massacred and wounded, and many are still under attack,‚Äù Herzog says in a statement.

‚ÄúThe State of Israel will take all measures necessary to eliminate this clear and immediate danger to our citizens. Israel will overcome in the face of all challenges,‚Äù he says.

‚ÄúI call upon the family of nations ‚Äì this war waged against us marks a line in the sand. Now is the time to hear clear, unequivocal condemnation of Hamas, its allies, and its backers in Iran. Now is the time to stand firm with Israel in support of its just and moral battle in the face of an abhorrent enemy,‚Äù he says.

[3:31 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/after-massive-hamas-assault-palestinian-media-says-160-killed-in-gaza-clashes-airstrikes/)

#### [After massive Hamas assault, Palestinian media says 160 killed in Gaza clashes, airstrikes](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/after-massive-hamas-assault-palestinian-media-says-160-killed-in-gaza-clashes-airstrikes/)

Palestinian media outlets report 160 killed and over 1,000 wounded recorded by hospitals in the Gaza Strip since this morning.

The toll likely includes those targeted by the Israeli military in airstrikes, and during clashes with troops in southern Israel.

[3:25 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/sderot-resident-people-opened-their-doors-when-hamas-terrorists-knocked-thinking-they-were-idf-troops/)

#### [Sderot resident: People opened their doors when Hamas terrorists knocked, thinking they were IDF troops](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/sderot-resident-people-opened-their-doors-when-hamas-terrorists-knocked-thinking-they-were-idf-troops/)

By [Canaan Lidor](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/canaan-lidor/ "Canaan Lidor")

Shoval Kahlon, a resident of Sderot, describes the situation in the border town which was infiltrated by Hamas terrorists.

‚ÄúThere are Hamas troops walking around. We see videos of them. They‚Äôre walking round with impunity,‚Äù she tells the Kan public broadcaster from the bomb shelter of her home.

Security forces are fighting terrorists in at least four areas in the town, the broadcaster reports.

‚ÄúWe woke up at 6:30 a.m. to alarms, we thought it was the usual rocket attacks but we started hearing gunshots on the street, sounded like it came from the parking of our building. Then we realized something was unusual. We then started seeing Hamas people in pickup trucks. They knocked on the homes of residents, who thought they were Israeli soldiers. They took them hostage,‚Äù says Kahlon.

[3:22 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/us-condemns-hamas-attacks-on-israeli-citizens/)

#### [US condemns Hamas attacks on Israeli citizens](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/us-condemns-hamas-attacks-on-israeli-citizens/)

By [Jacob Magid](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/jacob-magid/ "Jacob Magid")

An ultra-Orthodox Jew peers out of a building after a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip in Ashkelon, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Ohad Zwigenberg)

The United States ‚Äúunequivocally condemns the unprovoked attacks by Hamas terrorists against Israeli civilians,‚Äù says White House National Security Council spokesperson Adrienne Watson.

‚ÄúThere is never any justification for terrorism. We stand firmly with the government and people of Israel and extend our condolences for the Israeli lives lost in these attacks,‚Äù Watson says.

US ‚ÄúNational Security Advisor Jake Sullivan has spoken to Israeli National Security Advisor Tzachi Hanegbi and we remain in close contact with our Israeli partners,‚Äù Watson adds.

[3:11 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/baby-found-at-kibbutz-where-hamas-gunmen-infiltrated-parents-nowhere-to-be-seen/)

#### [Baby found at kibbutz where Hamas gunmen infiltrated; parents nowhere to be seen](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/baby-found-at-kibbutz-where-hamas-gunmen-infiltrated-parents-nowhere-to-be-seen/)

A baby has been found at Kibbutz Kfar Aza near the Gaza border, and the parents are nowhere to be seen, Channel 12‚Äôs Tamir Steinman reports.

The baby is alive. Kibbutz residents are pleading for anyone who has information on the baby‚Äôs family to come forward.

The kibbutz is one of several places where Hamas gunmen are still believed to be on the loose.

Steinman, speaking a few minutes later, also says several of his friends and contacts who live in areas close to the Gaza border, including some he was talking to earlier today, ‚Äúare no longer answering‚Ä¶ and it‚Äôs clear why they‚Äôre not answering.‚Äù

[3:09 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/education-ministry-says-schools-kindergartens-to-be-closed-nationwide-on-sunday/)

#### [Education Ministry says schools, kindergartens to be closed nationwide on Sunday](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/education-ministry-says-schools-kindergartens-to-be-closed-nationwide-on-sunday/)

The Education Ministry says all kindergartens and schools will be closed across the country on Sunday.

Earlier, the Israel Defense Forces‚Äô Home Front Command said that studies would not go ahead in the center and south of the country, but the ministry has expanded the closure to the entire country.

[3:07 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/un-middle-east-envoy-vehemently-condemns-hamas-assault-on-israel/)

#### [UN Middle East envoy ‚Äòvehemently condemns‚Äô Hamas assault on Israel](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/un-middle-east-envoy-vehemently-condemns-hamas-assault-on-israel/)

By [Jacob Magid](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/jacob-magid/ "Jacob Magid")

[![UN Mideast envoy Tor Wennesland addresses the UN Security Council in New York on November 28, 2022. (Screenshot/ UN, used in accordance with Clause 27a of the Copyright Law)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2022/11/tor-640x400.jpg "UN Mideast envoy Tor Wennesland addresses the UN Security Council in New York on November 28, 2022. (Screenshot/ UN, used in accordance with Clause 27a of the Copyright Law)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/un-middle-east-envoy-vehemently-condemns-hamas-assault-on-israel/)

UN Mideast envoy Tor Wennesland addresses the UN Security Council in New York on November 28, 2022. (Screenshot/ UN, used in accordance with Clause 27a of the Copyright Law)

The UN‚Äôs Middle East envoy Tor Wennesland ‚Äúvehemently condemns‚Äù today‚Äôs multi-front Hamas assault of Israeli towns near Gaza and the firing of rockets into central Israel.

‚ÄúThese events have resulted in horrific scenes of violence and many Israeli fatalities and injuries, with many believed to be kidnapped inside the Strip. These are heinous attacks targeting civilians and must stop immediately,‚Äù Wennesland says in a statement.

‚ÄúI am deeply concerned for the well-being of all civilians. I am in close contact with all concerned to urge maximum restraint and call on all sides to protect civilians.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a dangerous precipice and I appeal to all to pull back from the brink,‚Äù he adds.

[3:06 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/tv-reporter-describes-bodies-on-the-ground-in-sderot/)

#### [TV reporter describes ‚Äòbodies on the ground‚Äô in Sderot; mayor says Israelis haven‚Äôt yet understood what‚Äôs happened](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/tv-reporter-describes-bodies-on-the-ground-in-sderot/)

[![Alon Davidi, mayor of the southern city of Sderot, attends a press conference in Jerusalem, March 27, 2017. (Hadas Parush/Flash90)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2017/12/F170327HP12-640x400.jpg "Alon Davidi, mayor of the southern city of Sderot, attends a press conference in Jerusalem, March 27, 2017. (Hadas Parush/Flash90)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/tv-reporter-describes-bodies-on-the-ground-in-sderot/)

Alon Davidi, mayor of the southern city of Sderot, attends a press conference in Jerusalem, March 27, 2017. (Hadas Parush/Flash90)

The mayor of Sderot, Alon Davidi, says his city is still under attack.

‚ÄúDon‚Äôt open the doors, stay inside, close the windows‚Ä¶ we‚Äôre still searching the area,‚Äù he tells local residents via Channel 12.

He says the Hamas leadership, from Ismael Haniyeh on down, are ‚Äúanimals‚Äù who ‚Äúmust be harmed and killed.‚Äù

The people of Israel ‚Äúhaven‚Äôt yet seen‚Äù what‚Äôs happened in the city, he says ‚Äî ‚Äúinhuman acts‚Äù against innocent people. The terrorists have to be ‚Äúwiped out,‚Äù he says.

Israel has given Gazans food, water and electricity, and allowed Gazans into work, he notes, but the Gaza Hamas leadership are ‚Äúmurderers who must be buried under the ground. Not because we are cruel, but because those who are merciful to the cruel, ultimately are cruel to the good.‚Äù

‚ÄúPeople still don‚Äôt understand the numbers‚Äù and the extent of the attacks, he says.

A Channel 12 reporter in the city says there are many ‚Äúbodies on the ground‚Ä¶ terribly grave pictures, scenes that are hard to describe.‚Äù

These fatalities, the reporter stresses, are victims of gunfire by Hamas terrorists who infiltrated from Gaza into the city, not rocket attacks.

[3:04 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-40-killed-over-700-injured-since-start-of-devastating-hamas-attack/)

#### [At least 40 killed, over 700 injured in devastating Hamas attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-40-killed-over-700-injured-since-start-of-devastating-hamas-attack/)

[![Wounded Israeli soldiers from the south arrive at the Hadassah Ein Kerem Hospital in Jerusalem, October 7, 2023. (Noam Revkin Fenton/Flash90)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/F231007NRF49-640x400.jpg "Wounded Israeli soldiers from the south arrive at the Hadassah Ein Kerem Hospital in Jerusalem, October 7, 2023. (Noam Revkin Fenton/Flash90)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-40-killed-over-700-injured-since-start-of-devastating-hamas-attack/)

Wounded Israeli soldiers from the south arrive at the Hadassah Ein Kerem Hospital in Jerusalem, October 7, 2023. (Noam Revkin Fenton/Flash90)

At least 40 people have been killed and over 700 injured since the start of the massive attack by the Hamas terror group, the Magen David Adom emergency service says.

The Health Ministry says 779 people have been hospitalized.

Terror cells from the Gaza group have infiltrated a number of communities in the south of the country.

In addition, thousands of rockets have been fired at the center and south.

Hamas has claimed to have taken a number of hostages from Israel to the Gaza Strip. There has been no confirmation from Israel.

The assault has been ongoing since approximately 6:30 a.m.

The death toll is expected to rise.

[2:53 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/netanyahu-calls-on-citizens-to-unite-and-achieve-victory-in-war-amid-hamas-assault/)

#### [Netanyahu calls on citizens to unite and achieve victory in war amid Hamas assault](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/netanyahu-calls-on-citizens-to-unite-and-achieve-victory-in-war-amid-hamas-assault/)

[![Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu leads a security cabinet meeting in Tel Aviv, October 7, 2023. (Haim Zach/GPO)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/WhatsApp-Image-2023-10-07-at-14.43.21-640x400.jpeg "Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu leads a security cabinet meeting in Tel Aviv, October 7, 2023. (Haim Zach/GPO)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/netanyahu-calls-on-citizens-to-unite-and-achieve-victory-in-war-amid-hamas-assault/)

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu leads a security cabinet meeting in Tel Aviv, October 7, 2023. (Haim Zach/GPO)

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu makes a statement at the start of the security cabinet meeting, calling for all the citizens of the country to unite.

‚ÄúSince this morning, the State of Israel has been at war. Our first goal is first of all to cleanse the area of the enemy forces that have infiltrated, and restore security and peace to the settlements that were attacked,‚Äù Netanyahu says.

‚ÄúThe second goal, at the same time, is to exact a huge price from the enemy, also in the Gaza Strip,‚Äù he says.

‚ÄúThe third goal is to fortify other arenas so that no one makes the mistake of joining this war,‚Äù Netanyahu says.

‚ÄúWe are at war, in war, you have to keep calm. I call on all citizens of Israel to unite in order to achieve our highest goal ‚Äì victory in the war,‚Äù the premier says.

The official name for the campaign by the Israel Defense Forces amid the devastating Hamas attack is Operation Swords of Iron.

[2:44 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-says-carried-out-drone-strikes-on-hamas-terrorists-at-gaza-border/)

#### [IDF says carried out drone strikes on Hamas terrorists at Gaza border](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-says-carried-out-drone-strikes-on-hamas-terrorists-at-gaza-border/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

The Israel Defense Forces says it has carried out a number of drone strikes against several Hamas terrorists on the border with the Gaza Strip.

Airstrikes are continuing in other areas of the Gaza Strip at this hour, the IDF says.

[2:43 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/ukraines-zelensky-on-horrible-hamas-attack-israels-right-to-self-defense-is-unquestionable/)

#### [Ukraine‚Äôs Zelensky on ‚Äòhorrible‚Äô Hamas attack: ‚ÄòIsrael‚Äôs right to self-defense is unquestionable‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/ukraines-zelensky-on-horrible-hamas-attack-israels-right-to-self-defense-is-unquestionable/)

[![Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky speaks during a press conference with President of the European Commission Ursula Von der Leyen in Kyiv on May 9, 2023. (Sergei Supinsky/AFP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/05/33EP7NR-highres-e1683803096138-640x400.jpg "Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky speaks during a press conference with President of the European Commission Ursula Von der Leyen in Kyiv on May 9, 2023. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky speaks during a press conference with President of the European Commission Ursula Von der Leyen in Kyiv on May 9, 2023. (Sergei Supinsky/AFP)

Ukraine‚Äôs President writes a long post condemning the devastating Hamas terror assault on Israel and says that all its details should be revealed to the world.

Here is the post in full:

‚ÄúHorrible news from Israel. My condolences go out to everyone who lost relatives or close ones in the terrorist attack. We have faith that order will be restored and terrorists will be defeated.

‚ÄúTerror should have no place in the world, because it is always a crime, not just against a specific country or this terror‚Äôs victims, but against humanity in general and our entire world.

‚ÄúAnyone who resorts to terror commits a crime against the world. Whoever finances terror is committing a crime against the world. The world must stand united and in solidarity so that terror does not attempt to break or subjugate life anywhere and at any moment.

‚ÄúIsrael‚Äôs right to self-defense is unquestionable.

‚ÄúAll details surrounding this terrorist assault must be revealed so that the world knows and holds accountable everyone who supported and helped carry out the attack.

‚ÄúAll Ukrainian citizens who remain in the risk zone must carefully obey all orders issued by local security services and remain vigilant. Please be cautious. The Ukrainian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and our embassy in Israel are ready to assist in any situation.

‚ÄúTo support Ukrainians in Israel, we established an operational headquarters. If you require assistance, please contact any of our diplomatic or consular offices in any convenient and accessible manner.

Every life is valuable! We condemn all forms of terrorism.‚Äù

[2:23 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/reports-of-hostage-situation-in-ofakim-20-km-from-gaza-border/)

#### [Reports of hostage situation in Ofakim, 20 km from Gaza border](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/reports-of-hostage-situation-in-ofakim-20-km-from-gaza-border/)

An ongoing hostage situation is reported by Hebrew-language media in the southern city of Ofakim, some 20 kilometers from the border with the Gaza Strip.

Some reports say several Hamas terrorists have been killed by Israeli forces there.

There is no immediate comment from authorities on the incident.

[2:15 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/kibbutz-ein-hashlosha-residents-say-terrorists-still-inside-the-community/)

#### [Kibbutz Ein HaShlosha, Nir Yitzhak residents say terrorists still inside communities](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/kibbutz-ein-hashlosha-residents-say-terrorists-still-inside-the-community/)

Residents of Kibbutz Ein HaShlosha near the border with the Gaza Strip tell Channel 12 news that there are still terrorists within the community.

‚ÄúSend police or troops to help us, please,‚Äù one of them messages a reporter. ‚ÄúI am in the safe room, with a knife.‚Äù

In addition, the outlet says there is a Hamas gunman still roaming around Kibbutz Nir Yitzhak.

Throughout the day, residents of the border communities have been calling television outlets to beg for security forces to come and rescue them amid a mass infiltration by Hamas terrorists.

Channel 12 broadcasts footage from earlier this morning apparently showing a bulldozer breaking through the border fence between Israel and the Gaza Strip.

Dozens of terrorists from the Hamas terrorist group infiltrated into Israel by land, air and sea, going on deadly rampages through border communities.

The Hamas terror group has published footage showing its members capturing a number of Israeli soldiers during an attack on a military base on the border with the Gaza Strip this morning.

Other clips circulated online have purported to show Israeli civilians taken hostage by the terror group.

The IDF has yet to comment on the allegations.

EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell calls for the immediate release of Israeli hostages who were kidnapped and taken to Gaza amid a massive assault by the Hamas terror group.

‚ÄúThis is against international law,‚Äù he writes. ‚ÄúHostages must be released immediately.‚Äù

The Hamas terror group has published footage showing its members capturing a number of Israeli soldiers during an attack on a military base on the border with the Gaza Strip this morning.

Other clips circulated online have purported to show Israeli civilians taken hostage by the terror group.

[1:25 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/european-leaders-strongly-condemn-hamas-terror-assault/)

#### [European leaders strongly condemn Hamas terror assault](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/european-leaders-strongly-condemn-hamas-terror-assault/)

By [AFP](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/afp/ "AFP")
 and [ToI Staff](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/times-of-israel-staff/ "ToI Staff")

[![Israeli police officers evacuate a family from a site hit by a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip, in Ashkelon, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Tsafrir Abayov)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/AP23280288773913-640x400.jpg "Israeli police officers evacuate a family from a site hit by a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip, in Ashkelon, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Tsafrir Abayov)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/european-leaders-strongly-condemn-hamas-terror-assault/)

Israeli police officers evacuate a family from a site hit by a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip, in Ashkelon, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Tsafrir Abayov)

European leaders roundly condemn the massive assault by the Hamas terror group on Israel.

German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock says Hamas contributes to ‚Äúthe intensification of violence,‚Äù adding Israel ‚Äúhas our full solidarity‚Äù and ‚Äúthe right, guaranteed by international law, to defend itself against terrorism.‚Äù

France expresses ‚Äúfull solidarity with Israel and the victims‚Äù and underscored ‚Äúits absolute rejection of terrorism and its commitment to Israel‚Äôs security.‚Äù French President Emmanuel Macron said he ‚Äúfirmly condemns‚Äù the attacks.

Italy also backed ‚ÄúIsrael‚Äôs right to defend itself‚Äù against the ‚Äúbrutal attack.‚Äù

Britain‚Äôs foreign minister James Cleverly condemns the ‚Äúhorrific attacks‚Äù and underlined Israel‚Äôs right to self-defense.

Dutch PM Mark Rutte says: ‚ÄúAppalling images from Israel. Terror organization Hamas is waging an unprecedented attack on Israel‚Ä¶ This violence must stop; Israel has every right to defend itself.‚Äù

Spain says it is ‚Äúshocked by the indiscriminate violence‚Äù of the attacks on Israel while Ukraine and the Czech Republic say they back Israel‚Äôs right to defend itself.

[1:21 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/eus-top-diplomat-says-bloc-unequivocally-condemns-hamas-terror-attacks/)

#### [Top EU official says bloc ‚Äòunequivocally‚Äô condemns Hamas terror attacks](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/eus-top-diplomat-says-bloc-unequivocally-condemns-hamas-terror-attacks/)

By [AFP](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/afp/ "AFP")

[![European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen speaks during a press statement on Ukraine, at EU headquarters in Brussels, Feb 24, 2022. (Kenzo Tribouillard, Pool Photo via AP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2022/02/AP22055288614991-640x400.jpg "European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen speaks during a press statement on Ukraine, at EU headquarters in Brussels, Feb 24, 2022. (Kenzo Tribouillard, Pool Photo via AP)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/eus-top-diplomat-says-bloc-unequivocally-condemns-hamas-terror-attacks/)

European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen speaks during a press statement on Ukraine, at EU headquarters in Brussels, Feb 24, 2022. (Kenzo Tribouillard, Pool Photo via AP)

The European Union ‚Äúunequivocally‚Äù condemns attacks by the Palestinian group Hamas on Israel and called for an immediate stop to the violence.

The comments came after a barrage of rockets was fired and fighters from the Palestinian enclave infiltrated Israel, a major escalation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.

EU chief Ursula von der Leyen says she ‚Äúunequivocally‚Äù condemns the ‚Äúterrorist attack by Hamas on Israel,‚Äù adding that it was ‚Äúterrorism in its most contemptible form.‚Äù

‚ÄúIsrael has the right to defend itself against such odious attack,‚Äù she adds.

‚ÄúThis horrific violence must stop immediately. Terrorism and violence solve nothing. The EU expresses its solidarity with Israel in these difficult moments,‚Äù EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell says.

European Council president Charles Michel also condemns the ‚Äúindiscriminate attacks launched against Israel and its people this morning inflicting terror and violence against innocent citizens.‚Äù

‚ÄúMy thoughts are with all the victims. EU stands in solidarity with Israeli people in this horrific moment.‚Äù

[1:08 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/paramedic-among-those-killed-hamas-has-control-of-2-israeli-ambulances-magen-david-adom/)

#### [Paramedic among those killed; Hamas has control of 2 Israeli ambulances ‚Äì Magen David Adom](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/paramedic-among-those-killed-hamas-has-control-of-2-israeli-ambulances-magen-david-adom/)

A paramedic is among the confirmed dead so far in the massive assault by the Hamas terror group, the spokesman for the Magen David Adom emergency service says.

Eli Bin tells Army Radio that the paramedic was killed in his ambulance, and a medic in a second ambulance was badly injured.

Additionally, Bin says Hamas has control of two ambulances.

[1:04 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/health-ministry-545-hospitalized-since-start-of-hamas-attack/)

#### [Health Ministry: 545 hospitalized since start of Hamas attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/health-ministry-545-hospitalized-since-start-of-hamas-attack/)

[![A member of the fire brigade puts out the blaze following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip on Ashkelon in southern Israel, on October 7, 2023  (AHMAD GHARABLI / AFP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/33XK9K7-highres-640x400.jpg "A member of the fire brigade puts out the blaze following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip on Ashkelon in southern Israel, on October 7, 2023  (AHMAD GHARABLI / AFP)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/health-ministry-545-hospitalized-since-start-of-hamas-attack/)

A member of the fire brigade puts out the blaze following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip on Ashkelon in southern Israel, on October 7, 2023 (AHMAD GHARABLI / AFP)

The Health Ministry says 545 people have been hospitalized since the start of the massive attack by Hamas, which was launched by the terror group at around 6:30 a.m. this morning.

Earlier, the Magen David Adom emergency service said that at least 22 people have been killed. The death toll is expected to rise.

[12:52 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-publishes-footage-of-terrorists-capturing-idf-soldiers-in-attack-on-gaza-border-base/)

#### [Hamas publishes footage of terrorists capturing IDF soldiers in attack on Gaza border base](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-publishes-footage-of-terrorists-capturing-idf-soldiers-in-attack-on-gaza-border-base/)

The Hamas terror group publishes footage showing its members capturing a number of Israeli soldiers during an attack on a military base on the border with the Gaza Strip this morning.

Other clips circulated online have purported to show Israeli civilians taken hostage by the terror group.

The IDF has yet to comment on the allegations.

[12:50 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/attempted-stabbing-at-entrance-to-west-bank-settlement-attacker-shot/)

#### [Attempted stabbing at entrance to West Bank settlement, attacker shot](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/attempted-stabbing-at-entrance-to-west-bank-settlement-attacker-shot/)

[![The scene of an attempted stabbing attack at Beit Aryeh settlement in the West Bank, October 7, 2023 (Courtesy)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/WhatsApp-Image-2023-10-07-at-12.45.01-640x400.jpeg "The scene of an attempted stabbing attack at Beit Aryeh settlement in the West Bank, October 7, 2023 (Courtesy)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/attempted-stabbing-at-entrance-to-west-bank-settlement-attacker-shot/)

The scene of an attempted stabbing attack at Beit Aryeh settlement in the West Bank, October 7, 2023 (Courtesy)

There is an attempted stabbing attack at a settlement in the northern West Bank, according to local security officials.

The alleged attacker is said to have attempted to stab the civilian guard at the entrance to the Beit Aryeh settlement. The guard shot the assailant.

The suspect is being treated by military medics at the scene.

[12:32 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-palestinian-liaison-chief-hamas-opened-the-gates-of-hell-on-the-gaza-strip/)

#### [IDF Palestinian liaison chief: ‚ÄòHamas opened the gates of hell on the Gaza Strip‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-palestinian-liaison-chief-hamas-opened-the-gates-of-hell-on-the-gaza-strip/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

The military‚Äôs liaison to the Palestinians threatens Hamas after the terror group launched a surprise attack on Israel today.

‚ÄúHamas opened the gates of hell on the Gaza Strip, Hamas made the decision and Hamas will bear the responsibility and pay the price,‚Äù says Maj. Gen. Ghassan Alian, the Coordinator of Government Activities in the Territories.

[12:29 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-22-killed-in-massive-hamas-surprise-attack-emergency-service-says/)

#### [At least 22 killed in massive Hamas surprise attack, emergency service says](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-22-killed-in-massive-hamas-surprise-attack-emergency-service-says/)

[![Police officers evacuate a woman and a child from a site hit by a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip, in Ashkelon, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Tsafrir Abayov)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/AP23280288778376-640x400.jpg "Police officers evacuate a woman and a child from a site hit by a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip, in Ashkelon, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Tsafrir Abayov)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/at-least-22-killed-in-massive-hamas-surprise-attack-emergency-service-says/)

Police officers evacuate a woman and a child from a site hit by a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip, in Ashkelon, October 7, 2023. (AP Photo/Tsafrir Abayov)

The Magen David Adom emergency service says at least 22 people have been killed since the start of the massive attack by the Hamas terror group.

There are over 70 people seriously injured, a spokesman says.

Terror cells from the Gaza group have infiltrated a number of communities in the south of the country.

In addition, thousands of rockets have been fired at the center and south.

The assault has been ongoing since approximately 6:30 a.m.

The death toll is expected to rise.

[12:23 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-publishes-footage-of-gaza-strikes-in-response-to-massive-hamas-attack/)

#### [IDF publishes footage of Gaza strikes in response to massive Hamas attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-publishes-footage-of-gaza-strikes-in-response-to-massive-hamas-attack/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

The Israel Defense Forces publishes footage of Air Force strikes on Hamas assets in the Gaza Strip earlier today.

IAF jets have so far dropped more than 16 tons of munitions, according to a military source.

Several battalions from the standing army have been deployed to the Gaza border, as the military focuses most of its efforts on fighting Hamas terrorists still in Israeli territory.

[12:12 pm](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-home-front-cancels-school-in-south-center-of-country-on-sunday/)

#### [IDF Home Front cancels school in south, center of country on Sunday](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-home-front-cancels-school-in-south-center-of-country-on-sunday/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

[![Residents take shelter in the basement of a building following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023 (JACK GUEZ / AFP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/33XN7BG-highres-e1696665071534-640x400.jpg "Residents take shelter in the basement of a building following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023 (JACK GUEZ / AFP)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-home-front-cancels-school-in-south-center-of-country-on-sunday/)

Residents take shelter in the basement of a building following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023 (JACK GUEZ / AFP)

The Israel Defense Forces announces it is canceling schools in central and southern Israel, meaning roughly 1 million children will stay home tomorrow, amid ongoing fighting between Israel and terror groups in the Gaza Strip.

All schools south of Netanya and north of the central Negev are to be closed and businesses can only be opened if there is ready access to bomb shelters, the military says.

Gatherings are also restricted to 10 people outdoors and 50 people indoors in those areas, the IDF Home Front Command says.

The restrictions are valid till Sunday at 6 p.m., but will likely be extended further amid the fighting.

[11:59 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-country-in-state-of-war-hamas-terrorists-still-in-israel/)

#### [IDF: Country in state of war, Hamas terrorists still in Israel](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-country-in-state-of-war-hamas-terrorists-still-in-israel/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

[![Palestinian terrorists take control of an Israeli tank after crossing the border fence with Israel from Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip on October 7, 2023. (SAID KHATIB / AFP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/33XP69D-highres-640x400.jpg "Palestinian terrorists take control of an Israeli tank after crossing the border fence with Israel from Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip on October 7, 2023. (SAID KHATIB / AFP)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-country-in-state-of-war-hamas-terrorists-still-in-israel/)

Palestinian terrorists take control of an Israeli tank after crossing the border fence with Israel from Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip on October 7, 2023. (SAID KHATIB / AFP)

The Israel Defense Forces‚Äô top spokesman, Rear Adm. Daniel Hagari, says Israel is ‚Äúin a state of war‚Äù following Hamas‚Äôs surprise attack.

‚ÄúThe IDF has declared a state of war. We are in a state of war,‚Äù Hagari says in a live video statement.

‚ÄúMore than 2,000 rockets have been fired. Terrorists infiltrated, and some are still in Israel,‚Äù he says.

‚ÄúThe IDF is flooding the area with troops. We are focusing on the fighting on the Gaza border,‚Äù Hagari continues.

‚ÄúWe have begun a widespread call-up in all parts of the IDF. The Air Force is also striking in Gaza,‚Äù he adds.

[11:57 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/resident-of-southern-town-they-kidnapped-my-father-i-saw-pictures-of-him-in-gaza/)

#### [Resident of southern town: ‚ÄòThey kidnapped my father, I saw pictures of him in Gaza‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/resident-of-southern-town-they-kidnapped-my-father-i-saw-pictures-of-him-in-gaza/)

A woman tells Channel 12 news that her father has been kidnapped from a southern border community by Hamas terrorists and taken to the Gaza Strip.

‚ÄúHe messaged me that they were in the house,‚Äù she says, through tears.

‚ÄúHe told me they were taking him,‚Äù says the resident of Kibbutz Be‚Äôeri.

‚ÄúI saw pictures of him in Gaza,‚Äù she says.

[11:52 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hezbollah-praises-hamas-says-attack-is-message-to-arab-countries-normalizing-ties-with-israel/)

#### [Hezbollah praises Hamas, says attack is message to Arab countries normalizing ties with Israel](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hezbollah-praises-hamas-says-attack-is-message-to-arab-countries-normalizing-ties-with-israel/)

By [Gianluca Pacchiani](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/gianluca-pacchiani/ "Gianluca Pacchiani")

[![Hezbollah fighters hold the terror group's flags as they parade during a rally to mark Jerusalem Day in a southern suburb of Beirut, Lebanon, April 14, 2023. Hezbollah fighters hold the terror group's flags as they parade during a rally to mark Jerusalem Day in a southern suburb of Beirut, Lebanon, April 14, 2023. (AP Photo/Hussein Malla)

Hezbollah praises the massive Hamas operation against Israel, and says it is message to Arab countries normalizing with Israel.

The terror group Hezbollah says it is in direct contact with the Hamas leadership in Gaza and abroad, and calls on Arab and Muslim peoples around the world to declare their support to Hamas and the Palestinian people, adding that armed resistance is the only way to confront the Israeli ‚Äúaggression.‚Äù

Hezbollah adds that the ‚ÄúAl-Aqsa Deluge‚Äù operation launched by Hamas against Israel is a message to the international community and the Arab and Muslim world, in particular those countries seeking normalization with Israel.

It also calls on the Israeli government to learn the ‚Äúimportant lessons‚Äù taught by the ‚ÄúPalestinian resistance.‚Äù

[11:47 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/netanyahu-on-massive-hamas-attack-we-are-at-war/)

#### [Netanyahu on massive Hamas attack: ‚ÄòWe are at war‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/netanyahu-on-massive-hamas-attack-we-are-at-war/)

[![Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu gives a statement on October 7, 2023 (Screen grab)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/Screenshot-2023-10-07-at-11.43.57-e1696668348147-640x400.png "Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu gives a statement on October 7, 2023 (Screen grab)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/netanyahu-on-massive-hamas-attack-we-are-at-war/)

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu gives a statement on October 7, 2023 (Screen grab)

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu gives his first public statement on the massive attack by the Hamas terror group, saying the country is at war.

‚ÄúCitizens of Israel, we are at war,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúAnd we will win.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe enemy will pay a price like they have never known before,‚Äù he says, in his first public statement on the matter, some five hours since the start of the assault by the Gaza-based terror group.

There are reports of a number of dead and nearly 300 wounded as terrorists infiltrate a number of southern towns and thousands of rockets are fired at the center and south of the country.

[11:30 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/residents-of-towns-near-gaza-strip-beg-for-help-as-they-fight-off-terrorists/)

#### [Residents of towns near Gaza Strip beg for help as they fight off terrorists](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/residents-of-towns-near-gaza-strip-beg-for-help-as-they-fight-off-terrorists/)

Israeli residents near the Gaza Strip continue to ask for help and report on shooting by terrorists inside the towns while there is little or no IDF presence on the streets.

A pregnant Kibbutz Sufa resident speaks to Channel 12 from a safe room with her two-year-old child and close family members, saying: ‚ÄúThey are shooting at our house, they are trying to break down the door of the safe room.‚Äù

She reports that her husband and four other armed residents are fighting in the streets with no aid from the military.

‚ÄúI don‚Äôt understand how this is still going on. We‚Äôre in this situation since 6 a.m.,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúFour people cannot fight them off alone

‚ÄúSend help, please,‚Äù she cries.

Residents in other areas near the Gaza Strip report of unprecedented fighting on all major Israeli media sources. In an Instagram story timed to 9:55 a.m. cited by Ynet, a resident of Kfar Gaza writes: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm begging you!!! We can‚Äôt catch anyone! There are terrorists in Kfar Gaza, send forces to Kibbutz Kfar Gaza!!!‚Äù

A Channel 12 reporter in Beersheba describes receiving dozens of requests for help from residents of the Gaza Strip.

Mirjam Reijnen, a 42-year-old volunteer firefighter in Nahal Oz, tells AP: ‚ÄúWith rockets we somehow feel safer, knowing that we have the Iron Dome (missile defense system) and our safe rooms. But knowing that terrorists are walking around communities is a different kind of fear,‚Äù she said, adding that she and her three kids have been too scared to leave the shelter even for a moment to use the bathroom.

[11:28 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/magen-david-adom-calls-for-public-to-donate-blood-amid-widespread-hamas-assault/)

The Magen David Adom emergency service calls for the public to donate blood, especially those who are Type O.

Drives are being held in Tel Aviv at the Ichilov Hospital, in Jerusalem at the Magen David Adom station at 7 Ha‚ÄôMem Gimmel Street and in Haifa at the MDA station at 34 Yitzhak Sade St.

A further station will open in Hadera at the sports hall in the school at 20 Ha‚Äôatzmaut Street.

Further locations will be announced later in the day.

Nearly 300 people have been wounded in the widespread rocket attack and infiltrations by the terror group.

There have been nearly 200 wounded in the ongoing Hamas attack, according to statements from various hospitals.

At least two dozen are seriously or critically wounded.

In addition, at least six people have been confirmed killed.

[11:19 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/in-3-5-hours-since-attack-started-no-public-statement-from-netanyahu-beyond-cabinet-meeting-announcement/)

With Israel under attack by Hamas terrorists for over 3.5 hours, there has been no public statement from Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on the situation, beyond the announcement that the security cabinet will convene at 1 p.m.

At least six people have been killed and over 100 wounded in the ongoing assault by the Gaza-based terror group.

[11:09 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/gun-battles-with-hamas-terrorists-still-ongoing-in-at-least-7-locations-in-israel/)

The Israeli military is still fighting Hamas terrorists in a number of locations in southern Israel near the border with the Gaza Strip.

The gun battles are taking place in and around the towns of Kfar Aza, Sderot, Sufa, Nahal Oz, Magen, Be‚Äôeri and the Re‚Äôim military base.

[11:00 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/resident-of-kibbutz-infiltrated-by-terrorists-sends-whispered-plea-for-for-help-please-send-troops/)

#### [Resident of kibbutz infiltrated by terrorists sends whispered plea for help: ‚ÄòPlease send troops‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/resident-of-kibbutz-infiltrated-by-terrorists-sends-whispered-plea-for-for-help-please-send-troops/)

A resident of Kibbutz Be‚Äôeri tells Channel 12 news that they are barricaded in their homes and believe they have been abandoned by the authorities as Hamas terrorists infiltrate their community.

‚ÄúPlease send troops,‚Äù Eli Messika says, using the television channel as a conduit in a desperate attempt to speak to the authorities.

‚ÄúThere are wounded here,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúThere are burning houses.‚Äù

[10:42 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/head-of-shaar-hanegev-council-ofir-liebstein-killed-in-gunfight-with-hamas-terrorists/)

#### [Head of Sha‚Äôar Hanegev council Ofir Libstein killed in gunfight with Hamas terrorists](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/head-of-shaar-hanegev-council-ofir-liebstein-killed-in-gunfight-with-hamas-terrorists/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

The head of the Sha‚Äôar Hanegev Regional Council, Ofir Libstein, was killed during fighting with Hamas terrorists this morning, local authorities say.

‚ÄúOfir was killed when he went to defend a town during the terrorist attack,‚Äù the council says.

The deputy head of the council, Yossi Keren, is currently filling his place.

[10:39 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/opposition-heads-call-for-united-front-amid-massive-ongoing-hamas-attack/)

#### [Opposition heads call for united front amid massive ongoing Hamas attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/opposition-heads-call-for-united-front-amid-massive-ongoing-hamas-attack/)

(Avshalom Sassoni/Flash90)

A joint statement from Knesset opposition party heads gives full backing to the IDF and calls on the international community to condemn the acts of terror.

Yesh Atid head Yair Lapid, National Unity head Benny Gantz, Yisrael Beitenu head Avigdor Lieberman and Labor party head Merav Michaeli say, ‚ÄúIn days like these there is no opposition and no coalition in Israel.‚Äù

We ‚Äúare united in the face of terrorism‚Äù and the need to strike with ‚Äúa strong and determined fist,‚Äù says the statement, calling for retribution against Hamas and all terrorist organizations that cooperates with it.

‚ÄúIt is necessary to mobilize the international community against terrorism,‚Äù the statement continues, ending with strong support for the citizens of Israel, active and reserve IDF soldiers all security and emergency forces.

‚ÄúWe call on the citizens ‚Äî obey the directives of the Home Front Command, take care of yourselves and together we will overcome terrorism,‚Äù say the heads.

[10:35 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-2200-rockets-fired-from-gaza-hamas-terrorists-infiltrated-from-land-sea-and-air/)

#### [IDF: 2,200 rockets fired from Gaza; Hamas terrorists infiltrated from land, sea and air](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-2200-rockets-fired-from-gaza-hamas-terrorists-infiltrated-from-land-sea-and-air/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

[![A residential building in Tel Aviv is damaged following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023. (JACK GUEZ / AFP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/33XP4TY-highres-640x400.jpg "A residential building in Tel Aviv is damaged following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023. (JACK GUEZ / AFP)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-2200-rockets-fired-from-gaza-hamas-terrorists-infiltrated-from-land-sea-and-air/)

A residential building in Tel Aviv is damaged following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023. (JACK GUEZ / AFP)

The Israel Defense Forces says it has launched ‚ÄúOperation Swords of Iron‚Äù in response to Hamas‚Äôs surprise attack on Israel.

IDF Spokesman Rear Adm. Daniel Hagari tells reporters that more than 2,200 rockets fired into Israel since 6:30 a.m.

Hagari says the Hamas terrorists infiltrated from land, sea and air.

There are at least seven sites of fighting between Hamas terrorists and IDF troops.

The military expects to draft tens of thousands of soldiers.

IDF won‚Äôt comment yet on kidnapping allegations.

[10:31 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/bruno-mars-tel-aviv-concert-cancelled-amid-widespread-hamas-attack/)

#### [Bruno Mars Tel Aviv concert cancelled amid widespread Hamas attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/bruno-mars-tel-aviv-concert-cancelled-amid-widespread-hamas-attack/)

By [Jessica Steinberg](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/jessica-steinberg/ "Jessica Steinberg")

[![Pop singer Bruno Mars performs at Yarkon Park in Tel Aviv on October 4, 2023. (David Granot)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/WhatsApp-Image-2023-10-04-at-21.43.12-640x400.jpeg "Pop singer Bruno Mars performs at Yarkon Park in Tel Aviv on October 4, 2023. (David Granot)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/bruno-mars-tel-aviv-concert-cancelled-amid-widespread-hamas-attack/)

Pop singer Bruno Mars performs at Yarkon Park in Tel Aviv on October 4, 2023. (David Granot)

Live Nation, promoters of the Bruno Mars performances this week in Israel, announced that the planned Saturday night show is canceled.

All ticket holders for the concert will automatically receive refunds to the credit cards used to make the ticket purchase.

Earlier this morning, the promoter announced that the artist and his managers are being kept informed on the unfolding situation and waiting for instructions.

Bruno Mars performed on Wednesday night in Tel Aviv in front of a crowd of 60,000-plus, declaring his love for Tel Aviv during his first-ever Israel show.

[10:24 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-publishes-footage-of-terrorists-breaking-through-gate-of-israeli-community/)

[10:22 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/fire-and-rescue-services-raise-alert-to-highest-level-amid-hamas-assault/)

#### [Fire and Rescue Services raise alert to highest level amid Hamas assault](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/fire-and-rescue-services-raise-alert-to-highest-level-amid-hamas-assault/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

[![Israeli military vehicle heads towards the south on October 7, 2023 (AP Photo/Ohad Zwigenberg)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/AP23280254159356-e1696663247447-640x400.jpg "Israeli military vehicle heads towards the south on October 7, 2023 (AP Photo/Ohad Zwigenberg)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/fire-and-rescue-services-raise-alert-to-highest-level-amid-hamas-assault/)

The Israel Fire and Rescue Services say they have raised their alert to the highest level amid Hamas‚Äôs unprecedented attacks on Israel.

The fire service says it has been given approval to call up 200 firefighters from the Home Front Command to assist with rocket impact sites in southern Israel.

[10:18 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/israel-under-sustained-rocket-attack-from-gaza-for-over-3-5-hours/)

#### [Israel under sustained rocket attack from Gaza for over 3.5 hours](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/israel-under-sustained-rocket-attack-from-gaza-for-over-3-5-hours/)

[![Rockets fired from the Gaza Strip into southern Israel on October 7, 2023. (Liron Moldovan/Flash90)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/F231007LM008-640x400.jpg "Rockets fired from the Gaza Strip into southern Israel on October 7, 2023. (Liron Moldovan/Flash90)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/israel-under-sustained-rocket-attack-from-gaza-for-over-3-5-hours/)

Rockets fired from the Gaza Strip into southern Israel on October 7, 2023. (Liron Moldovan/Flash90)

The center and south of Israel have been under heavy rocket fire for over 3.5 hours amid a sustained and widespread attack.

At least five people are thought to have been killed and at least 100 hundred injured.

In addition, dozens of terrorists have infiltrated a number of southern towns. There are reports of multiple casualties.

#### [Defense Minister Gallant: ‚ÄòIsrael will win this war,‚Äô Hamas made ‚Äògrave mistake‚Äô with surprise attack](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/defense-minister-gallant-hamas-made-grave-mistake-with-surprise-widespread-attack/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

[![Defense Minister Yoav Gallant speaks at an awards ceremony for outstanding officers, at the IDF headquarters in Tel Aviv, September 3, 2023. (Shahar Yorman/ Defense Ministry](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/09/WhatsApp-Image-2023-09-03-at-20.24.26-e1693762475363-640x400.jpeg "Defense Minister Yoav Gallant speaks at an awards ceremony for outstanding officers, at the IDF headquarters in Tel Aviv, September 3, 2023. Defense Minister Yoav Gallant says the Hamas terror group has made a ‚Äúgrave mistake‚Äù for launching a surprise attack on Israel with rocket attacks and infiltrating into towns on the border with the Gaza Strip.

‚ÄúHamas made a grave mistake this morning and started a war against the State of Israel. IDF soldiers are fighting the enemy at all the infiltration sites,‚Äù Gallant says in remarks provided by his office.

‚ÄúThe State of Israel will win this war,‚Äù he adds.

[10:08 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/some-east-jerusalem-mosques-call-for-residents-to-join-hamas-assault/)

#### [Some East Jerusalem mosques call for residents to join Hamas assault](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/some-east-jerusalem-mosques-call-for-residents-to-join-hamas-assault/)

By [Gianluca Pacchiani](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/gianluca-pacchiani/ "Gianluca Pacchiani")

Mosques in Shuafat refugee camp in Jerusalem call to join the fight.

Pro-Hamas channels share a clip showing mosques of the Shuafat refugee camp inside the Jerusalem municipality, issuing from their minarets calls for people to mobilize.

Gunfire can also be heard in the background.

The channels also share videos of street celebrations in the West Bank city of Nablus.

[10:07 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hospitals-say-more-than-100-israelis-wounded-in-rocket-barrage-several-seriously/)

#### [Hospitals say more than 100 Israelis wounded in rocket barrage, several seriously](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hospitals-say-more-than-100-israelis-wounded-in-rocket-barrage-several-seriously/)

[![The scene after a rocket fired from Gaza hit a building in North Tel Aviv on October 7, 2023 (Tomer Neyberg/Flash90)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/F231007TN01-1-640x400.jpg "The scene after a rocket fired from Gaza hit a building in North Tel Aviv on October 7, 2023 (Tomer Neyberg/Flash90)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hospitals-say-more-than-100-israelis-wounded-in-rocket-barrage-several-seriously/)

The scene after a rocket fired from Gaza hit a building in North Tel Aviv on October 7, 2023 (Tomer Neyberg/Flash90)

Hospitals say more than 100 Israelis have been wounded in rocket strikes across south and central Israel, some in critical condition.

Soraka Hospital in Beersheba says it has received 80 patients, some of them in a very serious condition.

The Assaf Harofeh Medical Center near Tel Aviv says it is treating 17 patients, two in serious condition and one in moderate condition. the rest are lightly wounded.

The Kaplan Medical Center in Rehovot is treating 21 casualties including two in a serious condition who are being operated on.

Four are moderately wounded and 15 lightly.

Not all hospitals have reported their patients.

[10:04 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/rocket-fired-from-gaza-hits-road-in-town-near-jerusalem/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

Police say a rocket launched from the Gaza Strip landed on a road in a town near Jerusalem.

The rocket impact causes damage in Mevaseret Zion, but no injuries.

[9:44 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-closes-roads-near-gaza-border-amid-ongoing-hamas-assault/)

#### [IDF closes roads near Gaza border amid ongoing Hamas assault](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-closes-roads-near-gaza-border-amid-ongoing-hamas-assault/)

By [Emanuel Fabian](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/emanuel-fabian/ "Emanuel Fabian")

[![Smoke rises after a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip hits southern Israel, October 7, 2023 (Jamal Awad/Flash90)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/F231007JA04-640x400.jpg "Smoke rises after a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip hits southern Israel, October 7, 2023 (Jamal Awad/Flash90)")](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/idf-closes-roads-near-gaza-border-amid-ongoing-hamas-assault/)

Smoke rises after a rocket fired from the Gaza Strip hits southern Israel, October 7, 2023 (Jamal Awad/Flash90)

The Israel Defense Forces shutters roads near the border with the Gaza Strip amid Hamas‚Äôs surprise attack.

The closures include Route 4 from the Zikim junction to Netiv Ha‚Äôasara; Route 34 from the Yad Mordechai junction to Nir Am; and Route 232 from Mefalsim to Sa‚Äôad and Nir Yitzhak to Kerem Shalom.

All routes used by farmers in the area as also closed off by the army.

The Zikim beach on the Gaza border is also closed off, and trains will not run between Ashkelon and Sderot, the IDF says.

[9:41 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/videos-show-terrorists-in-sderot-apparent-kidnapping-of-soldier/)

By [AP](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/ap/ "AP")

Videos posted on social media showed what appeared to be uniformed Palestinian gunmen inside the Israeli border town of Sderot.

A video from Gaza showed what looked like the lifeless body of an Israeli soldier being trampled by an angry crowd shouting ‚ÄúGod is Great.‚Äù

Another video appeared to show Palestinian militants dragging away a live Israeli soldier on a motorcycle.

Other videos showed a crowd of Palestinian men dancing around and atop an Israeli tank that was on fire.

The authenticity of the videos could not immediately be verified.

Opposition Leader Yair Lapid receives a security update from the prime minister‚Äôs military secretary, Avi Gil.

[9:36 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/mayor-of-southern-bedouin-town-says-at-least-4-killed-by-rocket-fire/)

[9:28 am](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-calims-to-fire-5000-rockets-at-israel-declares-operation-al-aqsa-flood/)

#### [Hamas claims to fire 5,000 rockets at Israel, declares ‚ÄòOperation Al-Aqsa Flood‚Äô](https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/hamas-calims-to-fire-5000-rockets-at-israel-declares-operation-al-aqsa-flood/)

By [Gianluca Pacchiani](https://www.timesofisrael.com/writers/gianluca-pacchiani/ "Gianluca Pacchiani")

[![A residential building in Tel Aviv is damaged following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023. (JACK GUEZ / AFP)](https://static.timesofisrael.com/www/uploads/2023/10/33XP4TY-highres-640x400.jpg "A residential building in Tel Aviv is damaged following a rocket attack from the Gaza Strip into Israel on October 7, 2023.
